name: These Griffins!
description:
These griffins! - an arcade game that takes place in special arenas. This is a classic arcade game where you need to get as many scores as possible.

Gameplay

Eggs sometimes appear in the arena. Destroy the eggs by throwing them into the red zones. If the egg is not touched, then soon a griffin will hatch from it. The griffin can be killed with a multiplier - carefully follow the pointer near your character. Use additional features - for example, "juggle eggs" and dash down. Become the best at uh... an obscure indie game?

Features

- The presence of several control settings. Find your keyboard control style.

- Unique soundtrack and sounds!

- Two arenas.

- Upgrades.

- The first game of the developer.

The developer will be very happy with any of your feedback.
